I am a card carrying member of The WhoDat Nation (native Nola) - so this was perfect for #BoycottBowl on 2.3.2019 in New Orleans!  I wore this mask all day long, from 9am to 9pm, only taking it off to sit and eat at Meril's.  It was super light, comfortable, no sweating or digging, and lots of compliments.  Even made it to the news!  The only thing I needed to do was fill in the black lines with a sharpie.  Although they were there and more vintage worn looking, I wanted them to be solid so you could see my Black & Gold.  Definitely worth the cost.  I'll be wearing it again for Mardi Gras on a Bourbon Street balcony (my cousin's bar) in a month from tomorrow!  You won't go wrong with this one!!

Used this mask as décor for my sister's wedding.  Looked lovely hung on swaths of red velvet and added the right ambiance.  People loved that we gave them away as door prizes after the wedding.

评论详情: I ordered this mask in white for my daughter, who is going to a masquerade at her school. She's an average sized twelve year old girl, so it wasn't a surprise to see that the mask is slightly wide for her face, but it was easy to CAREFULLY bend the mask to form itself around her face. She looks great in it, lives the sparkle of the rhinestones, and is really looking forward to wearing it!

评论概述: Would have been perfect if any packing material had been included
评论详情: The mask is beautiful and as pictured. It fits right and looks gorgeous. Unfortunately it was the only thing in the box (no shipping material) and placed face down so the stones rubbed on the bottom of the box every time it was shifted in transit and some of them wore right through the plastic packaging. Surprisingly this didn't do much damage to the stones except the large stone under the right eye dislodged and was loose in the box when it arrived. Since the mask is all black with blue stones the empty gold cup that held the stone is very noticeable. If I re-set the stone with any glue that doesn't dry completely transparent it will also be very noticeable. Would have given 5 stars if a little paper or something had protected it.

评论概述: Beautiful mask. This is my second metal mask and ...
评论详情: Beautiful mask. This is my second metal mask and I love them because I can bend them to fit my face better than the plastic ones. HOWEVER, this mask is solid SILVER. The picture makes it look like it has black on the edges but it does not. I needed the mask in a hurry or else I would have asked for sure even though the description did say silver. You can't always be sure. Also make sure you are handy with a glue gun cause about 75% of the crystals fell off. After reading other reviews I expected that and being a crafty person it didn't bother me, but if you are looking for something to wear immediately out of the packaging you may not be able to with this style mask. Also because Amazon fulfilled the order it did arrive in an Amazon box, not just plastic packaging like others have mentioned.
